title: Becoming the Dragon Queen
description: After the burning of Dragongrove, Ingrid is homeless and directionless. Luckily, she has a big, sexy dragon shifter with her, and he's ready to fight for his kingdom and take back his crown. Ingrid is determined to stay by his side, but how can she survive in a war torn land full of fire breathing monsters?  --This 30k word novella is the second book in the Dragongrove series--Librarian's note: See alternate cover edition of ASIN B078PCLHMG here.
author: Imogen Sera
